boardgame.name: Comanchería: The Rise and Fall of the Comanche Empire
Comanchería: The Rise and Fall of the Comanche Empire
boardgame.description: Comancher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;a is the second game in Joel Toppen's _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;First Nations_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; series. Like its predecessor, Navajo Wars, Comancher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;a is a solitaire game in which the player plays from the Native American tribe's point of view._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In Comancher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;a, the player takes command of the Comanche nation. The player must drive hostile tribes from the southern plains, establish dominance over the region, set up trade networks with both friendly tribes and colonial powers, and finally defend all of this against relentless military and cultural attack._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;While many mechanics will feel similar to Navajo Wars, Comancher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;a is a very different game. Comancher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;iacute;a promises to deliver all the tough decisions and drama that Navajo Wars players have come to expect, but with a faster playing time and more streamlined victory objectives._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2016 Golden Geek Best Solo Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: The Good The Board and The Ugly Duckling: Ep 124 _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;When Bad Mechanisms Turn Good_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;

This is a very good, challenging solitaire game with plenty of replayability about the rise and fall of the Comanche Indian empire. You get an outstanding view of life from the perspective of the Indians and how they dealt with the increasing white invasion. The player gets a deep understanding of what events must have looked like from the perspective of the Comanche people (hint: the gods must be crazy) but there are a large number of strategies available to the player to protect the Comanche homelands. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m only selling the game because it takes a while to play and I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve got too many other good games competing for my attention that have a more interesting theme to me personally.
Played a handful of times. Shipping to be paid by buyer.
